attack announce: A huge eel lunges at you from one of the crevices lining the cave! It's twice as long as you are, with a head a fair bit larger than your own! You manage to avoid getting snatched up immediately, but it's already swinging around for another attack!
hunt announce: You lurk near one of the larger crevices, out of view from its occupant. There! It darts out to snag a nearby fish, and you charge for its exposed neck! It manages to dart forward out of your way, but now it's in the open, exposed! Press the attack!

cardsets.tell: The eel comes about, heading straight for you!

cards.aggress display: The eel lunges forward to bite you!
The eel slips past you, swinging its tail at you!
The eel lunges forward to bite you!
cards.abjure display: The eel swerves to avoid your attack!

cardsets.tell: Your scales start tingling! The eel's up to something.

cards.aggress display: The eel glows brightly, energy arcing out from it into the water!
cards.aggress deflect display: You dart back out of range just in time!

cards.aggress display: The eel glows brightly, energy arcing out from it into the water!
cards.aggress deflect display: You dart back out of range just in time!
cards.abjure display: The eel darts forward to evade!

details.text: You devour the eels's body, starting from the tip of the tail and working your way up to the head, like one giant noodle.
